Welcome to Sharing Lease!

Renting is Convenient.

Community Economic Sharing. Sharing goods with families nearby yourself.

Sharing Bennifit.

The leasors share goods with users, the leasors gain benifits, vary convenient for users to use shared goods, people experienced a social sharing of the economy.

Various Goods Shared.

Leasors invest to publish sharing goods into the market, express cabunet box and lockers, Users scan QR code to rent or puchase the goods.

Sharing easily

Publish goods, choose the target contry and city to share your goods, wait for user's renting or purchasing.

Open Platform for...

Umbrellas, Bike, Power banks...
